response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $15,000 to you. I am offering it to you today at a special price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that holds significant value and utility for you. I believe this price reflects both the quality of the product and the unique opportunity it presents. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
